Forecast_Up_To.Description: As per IMD forecast, no to very light rainfall is expected for next 5 days and the weather will be sunny and dry. Maximum temperature will vary from 30째C- 31째C and minimum temperature will vary from 17째C to 19째C. The range of maximum humidity may remain 57%-90% and minimum humidity may remain 18%-28%. Cloud cover will be 0-7 octa. Wind speed may vary from 6-8 kmph.

Agromet_Advisory.General_Advisory: Dry weather is likely to prevail in the district.
Agromet_Advisory.SMS_Advisory: Dry weather is likely to prevail in the district.

Crop_Specific_Advisory.Advisory: Inorder to control leaf blight in pigeon pea, spray Chlorothalonil @ 400 g in 200 litres of water per acre of land.
Pod borer in pigeon pea cultivation has been noticed in some places. Spray Chlorantraniliprole @ 80 ml in 200 litres of water per acre of land to control it.
Treat the green gram seeds with Vitavax power (Carboxyn + Thiram) @ 2 gm or Gaucho (Imidachloprid 600 FS) @ 5 ml per kg of seeds before sowing in the main field.

Additional_Resources.OUAT_KALINGA_Products: Unutilised small pieces of paddy straw can be used in oyster mushroom production so that cost of cultivation as well as manual work can be reduced.
